Class CodeListValue_Type

Namespace
NDSH.Geospatial.Metadata
Assembly
NDSH.Geospatial.Metadata.ISO19115.Ed2003.dll

Represents a specific value within a registered code list, ensuring standardized categorization and reference. This class implements multiple metadata interfaces to provide comprehensive code list support as per the ISO 19115 metadata standard.

[IsoType("CodeListValue_Type", IsoType = IsoTypes.ComplexType)]
[JsonObject("CodeListValue_Type")]
public class CodeListValue_Type : CharacterString, IModel, IObservableModel, INotifyPropertyChanged, IDbId, INullableRefValue<string>, INilReasoned, IComparable<CharacterString>, IEquatable<CharacterString>, ICodeList, ICodeListValue, INullableCodeSpace, IComparable<CodeListValue_Type>, IEquatable<CodeListValue_Type>

Remarks

The CodeListValue_Type class allows referencing an external code list value, supporting interoperability across metadata systems. It provides attributes to store the code list URI, the selected value within the list, and an optional code space.

Considerations:

  • The CodeList and CodeListValue properties are required attributes.
  • The CodeSpace property is optional but recommended for unambiguous referencing.

Maps to: CodeListValue_Type ( /2005/gco/gcoBase.xsd )

Properties

CodeList

Gets/Sets the URI reference to the external code list. This property is required and ensures compliance with the metadata schema.

[JsonProperty("codeList")]
[Required]
public required string CodeList { get; set; }

Property Value

string

Exceptions

ArgumentException

Thrown when the property is set to null or whitespace.

CodeListValue

Gets or sets the URI reference to a specific value in the external code list. This property is required and must be a valid URI.

[JsonProperty("codeListValue")]
[Required]
public required string CodeListValue { get; set; }

Property Value

string

Exceptions

ArgumentException

Thrown when the property is set to null or whitespace.

CodeSpace

Gets or sets the URI reference for the code space, defining the authority for the code list. This property is optional but recommended for metadata traceability.

[JsonProperty("codeSpace")]
public string? CodeSpace { get; set; }
